metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36329 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1. A use-after-free was found due to a thread being killed too early. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: libwebp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
